name: The knight's path
description:
Embark on a journey deep into the forest, in medieval times, in search of a princess locked away in a castle. Unravel puzzles based on the classic game Peg Solitaire, which will challenge you on this journey in search of the princess. Find your way to solve each challenge that will lead you closer to the red castle.

Explore enchanting locations full of detail, such as forests, ancient ruins and picturesque villages, each of which holds riddles to be deciphered.
